title: Remembering a TV Star: James Van Der Beek
summary: James Van Der Beek, an actor from the TV show Dawson's Creek, has died at age 48 from bowel cancer. His friends and co-stars, like Katie Holmes and Busy Philipps, are sharing kind words about him on Instagram. They talk about his bravery and kindness. He was diagnosed with cancer in 2023 and told everyone in 2024. He played Dawson Leery on the show from 1998 to 2003. People are sad and are helping his family by donating money online through a fundraiser. The fundraiser has raised over $1 million to support his wife and six children. His co-stars ask for privacy for the family during this hard time.
